errors.error_description: The instructions for running tests are in the wrong order. It directs the user to run pytest before installing the development dependencies, which will cause an error.
correction_candidates: First, install development requirements by running `pip install -r dev_requirements.txt`. After that, you can run the test suite with `pytest --cov`.
Run `make test` to automatically install dependencies and run the tests.
Run `pytest --cov` and if it fails, then run `pip install pytest pytest-cov`.
The instructions to run tests should be moved before the main installation section.
errors.golden_answer: First, install development requirements by running `pip install -r dev_requirements.txt`. After that, you can run the test suite with `pytest --cov`.

errors.error_description: The command to install development requirements is syntactically incorrect; it is missing the '-r' flag.
